nodes.text: Chrellis was a tiny planetoid located in the Chrellis system, a part of the Lahara sector in the New Territories portion of the Outer Rim Territories. Following the foundation of the Rebel Alliance in 2 BBY, the first base of the Alliance High Command, named Chrellis Base, was established on the planetoid under the command of the Human General Jan Dodonna.

When the Galactic Empire reallocated its sector fleets, Chrellis Base became uncomfortably close to Imperial Navy activity. The base, which had been designed for continual relocation, was then moved to the Tion Cluster planet Brigia.

Chrellis was first mentioned in The Rebel Alliance Sourcebook, which was authored by Paul Murphy and published in 1990 for use with West End Games's Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Chrellis system, and therefore Chrellis itself, in grid square M-5.
